tags:
  - release
---

{button}`Release Source <https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-spec/releases/tag/v0.0.4>`

## What's Changed
* ♻️ REFACTOR: `role -> mystRole` and `directive -> mystDirective` by `@chrisjsewell` in https://github.com/executablebooks/myst-spec/pull/29
* ✨ NEW: Add fields `enumerated` and `enumerator` to containers, math, headings by `@fwkoch` in https://github.com/executablebooks/myst-spec/pull/36
* ♻️ REFACTOR: mystDirective/mystRole `kind` -> `name` by `@chrisjsewell` in https://github.com/executablebooks/myst-spec/pull/35
* ♻️ REFACTOR: target -> mystTarget, comment -> mystComment by `@fwkoch` in https://github.com/executablebooks/myst-spec/pull/40

## New Contributors
* `@chrisjsewell` made their first contribution in https://github.com/executablebooks/myst-spec/pull/29

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/executablebooks/myst-spec/compare/v0.0.3...v0.0.4
